title: Fork You Boss
overview: From Monday to Sunday, 24/7! the main character relieves his stress from work by cooking. If you are like him, you will be thrilled by the way he treats cooking as a process of letting out his pent-up anger and chilling out after a long day. The gorgeous look and sound of food will water your mouth, and watching him savor his carefully prepared food will relieve even your stress and fill you up with happiness.
